creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil, four selvedge edges; red and white stripe ground, square and diamond patterns at chest, back and shoulders in multiple colors; turquoise and yellow alternating embroidery around neckline and armholes; white striping filled at shoulders, chest and back.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
